formula: If the binary expansion of n is b_{r-1} b_{r-2} ... b_2 b_1 b_0, then a(n) = 3^b_0 * Prod_{i=1..r-1} 2^b_i = 2^wt(n) if n is even, or (3/2)*2^wt(n) if n is odd (cf. A000120). - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 09 2014
